intro.text: Complete brand overhaul for a luxury hotel chain across the Gulf region, including logo design, visual identity, and brand guidelines. This project represents our commitment to creating sophisticated brand experiences that resonate with Middle Eastern luxury markets.

content.content: Al-Rashid Hotels approached us to modernize their brand identity while maintaining their heritage and luxury positioning in the competitive Gulf hospitality market. The existing brand felt outdated and failed to communicate the premium experience offered by the hotel chain.

content.caption: The new brand identity reflects the sophisticated elegance of the hotel's interior spaces

content.content: We developed a sophisticated visual identity that blends traditional Arabic design elements with contemporary luxury aesthetics. The new logo incorporates geometric patterns inspired by Islamic art while maintaining a modern, minimalist approach.

content.caption: Brand guidelines ensure consistency across all touchpoints, from digital to physical spaces
The visual identity extends seamlessly from interior spaces to exterior architecture

content.content: The rebrand resulted in a 40% increase in brand recognition, 25% boost in direct bookings, and successful rollout across 12 properties. The new identity successfully communicates luxury while honoring the brand's Middle Eastern heritage.

testimonial.quote: StudioEyn transformed our brand beyond our expectations. The new identity perfectly captures our luxury positioning while respecting our cultural heritage.
testimonial.author: Ahmed Al-Rashid
